text: No muri bo (indyarya), hari ababuza amahoro umuhanuzi (Muhamadi) bavuga bati “We yumva ibyo abwiwe byose.” Vuga uti “Yumva ibyiza kuri mwe, akemera Allah, akemera ibyo abwiwe n’abemeramana, kandi akaba impuhwe kuri ba bandi bemeye muri mwe.” Ariko ba bandi babuza amahoro Intumwa ya Allah, bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
